about_the_game:
PLOT

Step into the paws of a brave, four-legged special agent! In BARKOUR, you work for a secret organization where all agents are exceptionally skilled animals brought together by one goal: to save the world from the forces of evil (and mischievous cats)!

Prepare to face bizarre villains in entertaining, action-packed encounters! But don't fret—they may turn out funnier than expected. Each mission is like an episode of a spy comedy, riddled with twists and turns, p(b)arkour-intensive platforming, and fetching locations!

PROTAGONIST

Even though T.H.U.N.D.E.R. is a trained professional, he remains a regular dog at heart. He still needs to chase his tail, scratch an elusive itch behind his ear, and occasionally sniff someone's behind... even in the heat of battle. Dangerous, and yet undeniably adorable, he's the perfect mix of agent and man's best friend.

Apart from fluent acrobatics and lightning-fast movements, T.H.U.N.D.E.R. has a vast combat experience, making him a formidable foe to his enemies.

GAMEPLAY

Blessed with a talent for finding unique solutions and armed to the teeth with hi-tech gadgets, T.H.U.N.D.E.R., together with his trusty AI sidekick "A.L.F.-RED." are ready to take on the world of evil schemes and villainous activities. Whether you prefer the stealthy silent approach, or a full on "guns blazing" dive into danger, BARKOUR will cater to your playstyle.

KEY FEATURES:

Become a force to be reckoned with:
Blend stealth, parkour and combat to complete missions that allow for a different approach each time around. No two playthroughs will be the same!

Bring the bark to parkour:
Glide through missions with exceptional acrobatic skills and nimble, fast-paced movement. Use your speed and agility to traverse the world however you see fit.

Gear up with the best Hi-Tech gadgets in town:
Use an assortment of weapons and tools available in your arsenal, to beat villains and their goons with ease and dashing style.

Dive deep into diverse worlds:
Explore stunning locations filled with hidden passages, secrets to be sniffed out and a variety of missions to accomplish.

name: Barkour

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: BARKOUR is an action, stealth game where you take on the role of a tail-wagging canine 009 agent working for a secret organization that fights against evil in a world that does not take itself too seriously.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
